categories: Category:The Star Wars Holiday Special actors

nodes.text: Mickey Morton (March 8, 1927 - August 8,1993) was an American actor who portrayed Malla and Tork, and assisted with Gormaanda, in The Star Wars Holiday Special. He portrayed the drill thrall Kloog in the original Star Trek series, and was in the 1976 film The Four Deuces with Carl Weathers.
